ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Suggestions for a Level 30
ygData.msgSnippet: Just last night a good friend of mine lent me his old Cloak of the Shadows ... Now that is a nice cloak.  Prior to that I was using a Cloak of the Ice Bear.
ygData.messageBody:
Just last night a good friend of mine lent me his old Cloak of the Shadows
:)
Now that is a nice cloak. Prior to that I was using a Cloak of the Ice
Bear.

Rokenn


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]

> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Suggestions for a Level 30
